steps.name: Given Admin sends Get Request Program for the LMS with request body "GetProgramByIdWithInvalidEndpoint"
When Admin sends Get HTTPS Request and request Body with "programId" endpoint
Then Admin receives StatusCode with statusText "GetProgramByIdWithInvalidEndpoint" for Program
And Admin receives Response Body for the given programId
